data.lyric:
[ti:You're A Mean One, Mr. Grinch]
[ar:Thurl Ravenscroft]
[al:Country Christmas Greatest Hits]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You're A Mean One, Mr. Grinch (From "Dr. Seuss' How The Grinch Stole Christmas" Soundtrack) - Thurl Ravenscroft
[00:02.36]Written by：Ted Geisel/Albert Hague/Dr. Seuss/Ted Geisel
[00:04.72]You're a mean one Mr. Grinch
[00:07.77]
[00:09.03]You really are a heel
[00:13.09]
[00:13.62]You're as cuddly as a cactus
[00:15.97]You're as charming as an eel
[00:18.22]Mr. Grinch
[00:20.38]
[00:21.15]You're a bad banana
[00:22.92]With a greasy black peel
[00:27.38]
[00:34.97]You're a monster Mr. Grinch
[00:38.08]
[00:39.37]Your heart's an empty hole
[00:43.22]
[00:43.83]Your brain is full of spiders
[00:46.24]You've got garlic in your soul
[00:48.49]Mr. Grinch
[00:50.56]
[00:52.21]I wouldn't touch you with a
[00:54.41]Thirty nine and a half foot pole
[00:57.17]
[00:58.59]You're a vile one Mr. Grinch
[01:01.71]
[01:02.93]You have termites in your smile
[01:06.83]
[01:07.45]You have all the tender sweetness
[01:09.86]Of a seasick crocodile
[01:12.04]Mr. Grinch
[01:14.21]
[01:15.61]Given the choice between the two of you
[01:18.12]I'd take the seasick crockodile
[01:21.63]
[01:24.92]You're a foul one Mr. Grinch
[01:28.33]
[01:29.52]You're a nasty wasty skunk
[01:32.87]
[01:34.09]Your heart is full of unwashed socks
[01:37.01]Your soul is full of gunk
[01:38.78]Mr. Grinch
[01:41.00]
[01:42.09]The three words that best describe you
[01:44.50]Are as follows and I quote
[01:46.98]
[01:47.74]Stink stank stunk
[01:50.94]
[01:52.70]You're a rotter Mr. Grinch
[01:55.62]
[01:56.92]You're the King of sinful sots
[02:00.14]
[02:01.77]Your heart's a dead tomato splot
[02:04.20]With moldy purple spots
[02:06.07]Mr. Grinch
[02:08.35]
[02:09.29]Your soul is an apalling dump heap overflowing
[02:13.25]With the most disgraceful assortment of deplorable
[02:16.19]Rubbish imaginable
[02:17.30]
[02:18.13]Mangled up in tangled up knots
[02:22.10]
[02:23.39]You nauseate me Mr. Grinch
[02:26.63]
[02:27.94]With a nauseaus super naus
[02:31.25]
[02:32.37]You're a crooked jerky jockey
[02:34.72]And you drive a crooked horse
[02:37.00]Mr. Grinch
[02:39.13]
[02:40.66]You're a three decker saurkraut and toadstool
[02:43.78]Sandwich
[02:44.50]
[02:45.72]With arsenic sauce
